snippet: A man who was jailed after taking a gun, ammunition and knives to an Ohio theater felt he needed protection after last month’s deadly Colorado theater shooting, his lawyer said.
abstract: Scott A Smith is arrested and jailed after taking a gun, ammunition and knives to a showing of the latest Batman movie at a Westlake, Ohio, theater; his lawyer says he felt he needed protection after the deadly Colorado theater shooting.
lead_paragraph: A man who was jailed after taking a gun, ammunition and knives to an Ohio theater felt he needed protection after last month’s deadly Colorado theater shooting, his lawyer said.

headline.main: Ohio: Man Armed at Movie Says He Wanted Protection
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Man Armed at Movie Says He Wanted Protection
